    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        @Nonnull
public static LzoLibrary getInstance()

      • newCompressor

        @Nonnull
public LzoCompressor newCompressor(@CheckForNull
                                  LzoAlgorithm algorithm,
                                  @CheckForNull
                                  LzoConstraint constraint)
        Returns a new compressor for the given algorithm. Currently the only available constraint is LzoConstraint.COMPRESSION. Applied to LzoAlgorithm.LZO1X algorithm, it yields an LZO1X999 compressor with a compression level of 7.

      • newDecompressor

        @Nonnull
public LzoDecompressor newDecompressor(@Nonnull
                                      LzoAlgorithm algorithm,
                                      @CheckForNull
                                      LzoConstraint constraint)
        Returns a new decompressor for the given algorithm. The only constraint which makes sense is LzoConstraint.SAFETY.
